title: The Antithesis: Vengeance
description: THE ANTITHESIS #5: The final installment of the series--; The end is near.‘Malkhet, the fourth of tenSons of Terehet, was stricken whenThere among the frozen fields of MoritoriaHe found his beloved;Bloodied, ravaged, without lifeAn untimely death, an unfair fight.A hand against her cold, pale faceHe made an oath to save his raceTo avenge those fallen with his wifeTo take their heads in sacrifice.Mortality, morals, all tossed aside,Picking up his sword, he drew a lineAcross the ground, and looked above,Vowing no return ‘til he was done.'
author: Terra Whiteman
